title: DApp UX Design Awards
description: Enter, the DApp UX Design Awards!  The DApp UX Design Awards recognizes the talent and effort of the most ingenious DApps from developers and designers; voted by the community, for the community. DApps Awards fall into the following categories: 1) On-boarding 2) Key Management 3) Login 4) Transaction Experience 5) Visual Identity 6) Overall UX
